product_name: Sea to Summit TPU Accessory Case - Medium
long_description: The medium Sea to Summit TPU Accessory Case lets you bring your gadgets along for the paddle. Made of optically clear thermoplastic urethane (TPU), the TPU Accessory Case provides a watertight, roll-top closure that helps protect water-sensitive electronics. PVC-free material is flexible, resists UV light and won't crack in extreme cold. Welded seams enhance durability, and anchor points offer a convenient way to help store items. The medium Sea to Summit TPU Accessory Case includes a neck strap.
short_description: The medium Sea to Summit TPU Accessory Case lets you bring your gadgets along for the paddle.
